titles: A manual of directions for the sick with many sweet meditations and devotions of the R. Reverend Father in God, Lancelot Andrews, late L. Bishop of Winchester : to which are added praiers for the morning, evening and H. communion / translated out of Greeke ms. of his private devotions by R. D. ...
author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
R. D. (Richard Drake), d. 1681.
notes: To the reader signed: R. D.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Sick --  Prayer-books and devotions --  Early works to 1800.
